Actions.Text: REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING
REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING

Title: Relates to the authority of the capital district regional off-track betting corporation to retain and disburse certain uncashed tickets
Summary: Relates to the authority of the capital district regional off-track betting corporation to retain and disburse certain uncashed tickets to the corporations' participating counties.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to the authority of the capital district regional off-track betting corporation to retain and disburse certain uncashed tickets
